On this page

Player Management ‚Äã

The Z-Dashboard provides an exhaustive suite for managing your active and offline player base. Navigate to the Players tab via the sidebar to access the master table.

The Player Overview Modal ‚Äã

Clicking on any player in the table opens their Player Overview Modal. This modal is the command center for interacting with an individual user.

1. Live Vitals ‚Äã

At a glance, view the player's real-time health and armor (represented by a live-updating bar), their current session ping, and Discord/Steam linked accounts.

2. Economy Management ‚Äã

Directly underneath their vitals, you can view their current Cash and Bank balances. Click the Edit button next to their funds to open a secure prompt allowing you to Set, Add, or Remove money instantly without relying on chat commands.

3. Moderation Tools ‚Äã

The "Actions" tab provides one-click access to essential moderation features:

  • Revive / Heal
  • Bring / Go To
  • Spectate
  • Freeze
  • Warn: Triggers an in-game UI warning popup for the user.

4. Danger Zone ‚Äã

For serious infractions, access the Danger Zone to:

  • Wipe Inventory: Deletes all items currently on the player.
  • Kick: Disconnects them with a custom reason.
  • Ban: Opens the advanced Ban Dialog, allowing you to specify a reason and duration, calculating the exact unban timestamp automatically.

Fun & Troll Actions ‚Äã

Z-Dashboard includes a dedicated suite of "Troll Actions" explicitly designed for having fun with rule-breakers before removing them.

Located under the Fun & Troll Actions header:

  • üî• Set on Fire: Ignites the player.
  • üí£ Explode: Spawns a small, non-lethal explosion at their feet.
  • üñ•Ô∏è Fake Crash: Simulates a FiveM fatal error on their screen.
  • üöó Pop Tires: Blows out all tires of their current vehicle.
  • üç∏ Drunk Mode: Forces extreme screen blur and wobbly walking animations.
  • ‚¨ÜÔ∏è Eject: Violently launches them out of their vehicle into the air.
  • üêæ Animal Attack: Spawns a hostile mountain lion to hunt them down.
  • üîÑ Invert Cam: Flips their entire game screen upside down.
  • üëØ Clone Player: Spawns an aggressive hostile clone of themselves.
  • üêå Snail Mode: Restricts their movement speed to a crawl.
  • üå™Ô∏è Launch: Flings them into the stratosphere spinning uncontrollably.
